Trigger.name: assist
Trigger.script:
PrimerSpellCast = false
if AssistSpells == nil then AssistSpells = {} end
if PrimerSpell == nil then PrimerSpell = "" end
if string.lower(matches[2]) == string.lower(gmcp.Char.Score.name) or string.sub(string.lower(matches[2]),1,3) == string.sub(string.lower(gmcp.Char.Score.name),1,3) or string.sub(string.lower(matches[2]),1,4) == string.sub(string.lower(gmcp.Char.Score.name),1,4) then
create_tfe_database()
local mydb = db:get_database("skills") local mysql = "select * from abilities where ability like '" .. tostring(matches[3]) .. "%' and level > 0 and character = '" .. gmcp.Char.Score.name .. "' limit 1" local results = db:fetch_sql(mydb.abilities, mysql)
if next(results) then for _, row in ipairs(results) do if table.maxn(AssistSpells) == 0 and PrimerSpell == "" then PrimerSpell = row.ability send("assist -a " .. row.ability) send("gstatus Assisting with: " .. row.ability) else table.insert(AssistSpells, row.ability) send("gstatus Assisting with: " .. PrimerSpell .. " > " .. table.concat( AssistSpells, " > ")) end end else send("gstatus I don't know the ability: " .. matches[3]) end end

Trigger.name: assist clear
Trigger.script:
if string.lower(matches[2]) == string.lower(gmcp.Char.Score.name) or string.sub(string.lower(matches[2]),1,3) == string.sub(string.lower(gmcp.Char.Score.name),1,3) or string.sub(string.lower(matches[2]),1,4) == string.sub(string.lower(gmcp.Char.Score.name),1,4) then
AssistSpells = {} PrimerSpell = "" PrimerSpellCast = false send("assist -a none") send("gstatus Assisting spells cleared.") end

Trigger.name: begin casting queued spells
Trigger.script:
if (matches[2] == PrimerSpell and not PrimerSpellCast and table.maxn(AssistSpells) > 0) then for keyValue, itemValue in pairs(AssistSpells) do send("cast " .. itemValue) end PrimerSpellCast = true end
if matches[2] == PrimerSpell and continuouscasting then send("cast " .. PrimerSpell) end

Trigger.name: auto assist
Trigger.script: --Your auto.assist skill is not set. if (matches[2] == "none") then PrimerSpell = "" else PrimerSpell = matches[2] end

regexCodeList.string: ^Your auto.assist skill is currently set to: (.*)$

Trigger.name: assist tank following
Trigger.script: if matches[3] == Tank then send ("assist " .. Tank) end

Trigger.name: reset primer cast variable
Trigger.script: PrimerSpellCast = false

Trigger.name: assist tank rescuing
Trigger.script: if matches[2] == Tank then send("cast " .. PrimerSpell) --Send the Primer Spell for keyValue, itemValue in pairs(AssistSpells) do send("cast " .. itemValue) --Send the rest of the queued Spells end end

Trigger.name: report assisting spells
Trigger.script:
if string.lower(matches[5]) == string.lower(gmcp.Char.Score.name) or string.sub(string.lower(matches[5]),1,3) == string.sub(string.lower(gmcp.Char.Score.name),1,3) or string.sub(string.lower(matches[5]),1,4) == string.sub(string.lower(gmcp.Char.Score.name),1,4) then
if table.maxn(AssistSpells) == 0 and PrimerSpell == "" then send("gstatus Assisting with: none") elseif table.maxn(AssistSpells) == 0 and PrimerSpell ~= "" then send("gstatus Assisting with: " .. PrimerSpell) else send("gstatus Assisting with: " .. PrimerSpell .. " > " .. table.concat( AssistSpells, " > ")) end
end

Trigger.name: continuous casting
Trigger.script:
if string.lower(matches[3]) == string.lower(gmcp.Char.Score.name) or string.sub(string.lower(matches[3]),1,3) == string.sub(string.lower(gmcp.Char.Score.name),1,3) or string.sub(string.lower(matches[3]),1,4) == string.sub(string.lower(gmcp.Char.Score.name),1,4) then
if string.lower(matches[4]) == "on" or string.lower(matches[4]) == "off" then if string.lower(matches[4]) == "on" then continuouscasting = true send("gstatus Continuous casting has been enabled.") elseif string.lower(matches[4]) == "off" then continuouscasting = false send("gstatus Continuous casting has been disabled.") end else send("gstatus Please use 'on' or 'off' for continous casting.") end end

Trigger.name: pfree or pfull
Trigger.script:
Releech_Druid_Spells()
if tonumber(gmcp.Char.Vitals.hp) < tonumber(gmcp.Char.Vitals.maxhp) then if get_ability_level(gmcp.Char.Score.account,gmcp.Char.Score.name,"salve") > 0 then send("queue put all.bandage,all.peppermint XTEMP") send("queue get bandage,peppermint XTEMP") send("queue rest & salve self") elseif get_ability_level(gmcp.Char.Score.account,gmcp.Char.Score.name,"poultice") > 0 then send("queue put all.band,all.aloe XTEMP") send("queue get bandage,aloe XTEMP") send("queue rest & poultice self") elseif get_ability_level(gmcp.Char.Score.account,gmcp.Char.Score.name,"compress") > 0 then send("queue put all.band,all.herb XTEMP") send("queue get bandage,herbs XTEMP") send("queue rest & compress self") elseif get_ability_level(gmcp.Char.Score.account,gmcp.Char.Score.name,"bandage") > 0 then send("queue put all.bandage XTEMP") send("queue get bandage XTEMP") send("queue rest & bandage self") end else --to help with spamming these to 10 to get healing mist/healing rain if get_ability_level(gmcp.Char.Score.account,gmcp.Char.Score.name,"poultice") > 0 and get_ability_level(gmcp.Char.Score.account,gmcp.Char.Score.name,"poultice") < 10 then send("queue put all.bandage,all.herb,all.aloe XTEMP") send("queue get bandage,aloe XTEMP") send("queue remove ritual.dagg & remove pantal & wear pantal & wear ritu.dagg & rest & poultice self") elseif get_ability_level(gmcp.Char.Score.account,gmcp.Char.Score.name,"compress") > 0 and get_ability_level(gmcp.Char.Score.account,gmcp.Char.Score.name,"compress") < 10 then send("queue put all.bandage,all.herb,all.aloe XTEMP") send("queue get bandage,herbs XTEMP") send("queue remove ritual.dagg & remove pantal & wear pantal & wear ritu.dagg & rest & compress self") elseif get_ability_level(gmcp.Char.Score.account,gmcp.Char.Score.name,"bandage") > 0 and get_ability_level(gmcp.Char.Score.account,gmcp.Char.Score.name,"bandage") < 10 then send("queue put all.bandage,all.herb,all.aloe XTEMP") send("queue get bandage XTEMP") send("queue remove ritual.dagg & remove pantal & wear pantal & wear ritu.dagg & rest & bandage self") end end
if gmcp.Char.Score.name == "Cynder" then expandAlias("sl") else expandAlias("sle") end

Trigger.name: help
Trigger.script:
if (string.lower(matches[6]) == string.lower(gmcp.Char.Score.name) or string.sub(string.lower(matches[6]),1,3) == string.sub(string.lower(gmcp.Char.Score.name),1,3) or string.sub(string.lower(matches[6]),1,4) == string.sub(string.lower(gmcp.Char.Score.name),1,4)) and (string.lower(matches[7]) == "help" or string.lower(matches[7]) == "status") then
expandAlias("standardhelp") expandAlias("standardhelpcaster") send("gstatus gtell 'cp <target>' for me to cure poison someone.") send("gstatus gtell 'cb <target>' for me to cure blindness someone.") send("gstatus gtell '" .. string.sub(string.lower(myChar),1,3) .. " hide <on|off>' for me to start or stop hiding.") send("gstatus gtell '" .. string.sub(string.lower(myChar),1,3) .. " assist' to what spells are in the queue.") send("gstatus gtell '" .. string.sub(string.lower(myChar),1,3) .. " assist <spell name>' to add a spell to the queue.") send("gstatus gtell '" .. string.sub(string.lower(myChar),1,3) .. " clear' to remove all queued spells.") send("gstatus gtell '" .. string.sub(string.lower(myChar),1,3) .. " cc <on or off>' for continuous casting the first spell in the queue.") send("gstatus gtell 'count' to what spells I have prepared.") send("gstatus gtell '" .. string.sub(string.lower(myChar),1,3) .. " druidleechlist' - to see spells I cast on 'up'.") send("gstatus gtell '" .. string.sub(string.lower(myChar),1,3) .. " druidleech <spell>' - to add or remove spells recast on 'up'.") send("gstatus gtell '" .. string.sub(string.lower(myChar),1,3) .. " druidleechclear' - to remove all spells set to reset on 'up'.") send("gstatus gtell '" .. string.sub(string.lower(myChar),1,3) .. " druidleechreset' - to set all spells to inactive and recheck active affects.") send("gstatus gtell '" .. string.sub(string.lower(myChar),1,3) .. " list' - will display my reagent supply.") end

if string.lower(matches[2]) == string.lower(gmcp.Char.Score.name) or string.sub(string.lower(matches[2]),1,3) == string.sub(string.lower(gmcp.Char.Score.name),1,3) or string.sub(string.lower(matches[2]),1,4) == string.sub(string.lower(gmcp.Char.Score.name),1,4) then
reportTo = "gstatus" enableTrigger("ListReagents") myReagentList = {} --declare it to be a Lua table
tempTimer( 1, [[expandAlias("load3") send ("look in XREGA & look in XREGB")]] ) tempTimer( 3, [[ send(reportTo .. " Here is my reagent supply:") for k,v in pairs(myReagentList) do send(reportTo .. " " .. v) end disableTrigger("ListReagents") expandAlias("unload3") ]] ) end

Trigger.name: hiding on off
Trigger.script:
local knownhide = false
if string.lower(matches[5]) == string.lower(gmcp.Char.Score.name) or string.sub(string.lower(matches[5]),1,3) == string.sub(string.lower(gmcp.Char.Score.name),1,3) or string.sub(string.lower(matches[5]),1,4) == string.sub(string.lower(gmcp.Char.Score.name),1,4) then
create_tfe_database() local mydb = db:get_database("skills")
if gmcp.Char.Score.level > 19 then
local results = db:fetch(mydb.abilities, { db:eq(mydb.abilities.ability, "hide"), db:eq(mydb.abilities.character, gmcp.Char.Score.name), db:eq(mydb.abilities.account, gmcp.Char.Score.account)})
if next(results) then for _, row in ipairs(results) do if tonumber(row.level) > 0 then knownhide = true enableTrigger("hide on death") end end else knownhide = false end end
if string.lower(matches[7]) == "on" then send("gstatus " .. gmcp.Char.Score.name .. " has hiding enabled.") enableTrigger("AutoHiding") if knownhide then send("hide") end elseif string.lower(matches[7]) == "off" then send("gstatus " .. gmcp.Char.Score.name .. " has hiding disabled.") disableTrigger("AutoHiding") if knownhide then send("unhide") end end end

--Ensure primary abilities are online if not quickening then expandAlias("get3 spotted.cheetah.skin") send("cast quickening") end if not puissance then expandAlias("get3 soft.snow-white.bear.skin") send("cast puissance") end if not darklight then expandAlias("get3 twisted.wire") send("cast darklight") end --if not landbinding then -- send("cast landbinding") --end --if not shadowsight then -- expandAlias("get3 black.white.feather") -- send("cast shadow-sight") -- end if not embraceofshades then send("cast embrace of shades") end -- if not Blizzard then -- send("prepare blizzard") -- end
--If yes, start killing, otherwise skip room if quickening and puissance and darklight --and landbinding and shadowsight and Blizzard and SelfCurrentMana > 900 and SelfCurrentHp > 900 then send("cast xerotes") send("prepare tempest & speed www & cast tempest & c whirlwind nym") else cecho("<yellow>\n[BOT] Waiting 20 seconds and checking again.") send("sleep") tempTimer( 20, [[ send("typo") ]] ) end ]=] ) else send("gstatus [WARNING] Missing: " .. table.concat(CharsMissing, ", ")) tempTimer( 30, [[ send("scan & group & typo") ]] ) end

--Ensure primary abilities are online if not quickening then expandAlias("get3 spotted.cheetah.skin") send("cast quickening") end if not puissance then expandAlias("get3 soft.snow-white.bear.skin") send("cast puissance") end if not darklight then expandAlias("get3 twisted.wire") send("cast darklight") end if not landbinding then send("cast landbinding") end if not shadowsight then expandAlias("get3 black.white.feather") send("cast shadow-sight") end if not embraceofshades then send("cast embrace of shades") end
--If yes, start killing, otherwise skip room if quickening and puissance and darklight and landbinding and shadowsight and SelfCurrentMana > 700 and SelfCurrentHp > 700 then send("speed www & cast veil of darkness ogre") else cecho("<yellow>\n[BOT] Waiting 20 seconds and checking again.") send("sleep") tempTimer( 20, [[ send("typo") ]] ) end ]=] ) else send("gstatus [WARNING] Missing: " .. table.concat(CharsMissing, ", ")) tempTimer( 30, [[ send("scan & group & cast veil of darkness ogre") ]] ) end

Trigger.name: druid leech - edit leeched spells
Trigger.script:
if string.lower(matches[3]) == string.lower(gmcp.Char.Score.name) or string.sub(string.lower(matches[3]),1,3) == string.sub(string.lower(gmcp.Char.Score.name),1,3) or string.sub(string.lower(matches[3]),1,4) == string.sub(string.lower(gmcp.Char.Score.name),1,4) then
--Create Database if not exists, otherwise update table schema create_tfe_database()
--Load Database to local variable local mydb = db:get_database("skills")
local mysql = "select * from abilities where ability = '"..tostring(matches[5]).."' and level > 0 and character = '"..gmcp.Char.Score.name.."' limit 1" local resultsabil = db:fetch_sql(mydb.abilities, mysql)
--Check to see if I have the ability prac'd to at least level 1 if next(resultsabil) then local mysql = "select * from druidfadedspells where spell = '"..resultsabil[1].ability.."' and character = '"..gmcp.Char.Score.name.."' limit 1" local results = db:fetch_sql(mydb.druidfadedspells, mysql) --Check to see if ability exists in druidfadedspells table if next(results) then --if yes, then flip to no if results[1].alwaysonline == "yes" then results[1].alwaysonline = "no" db:update(mydb.druidfadedspells, results[1]) send("gstatus "..resultsabil[1].ability.." has been removed from druidleech.") --If no, then flip to yes else results[1].alwaysonline = "yes" db:update(mydb.druidfadedspells, results[1]) send("gstatus "..resultsabil[1].ability.." is now to set recast on druidleech.") end --didn't exist, so add and set to yes else db:add(mydb.druidfadedspells, {character=gmcp.Char.Score.name, spell=resultsabil[1].ability, leeched="no", alwaysonline="yes"}) send("gstatus " .. resultsabil[1].ability .. " is now to set recast on druidleech.") end else send("gstatus I don't know the ability: "..resultsabil[1].ability) end end

Trigger.name: druid leech list
Trigger.script:
if string.lower(matches[3]) == string.lower(gmcp.Char.Score.name) or string.sub(string.lower(matches[3]),1,3) == string.sub(string.lower(gmcp.Char.Score.name),1,3) or string.sub(string.lower(matches[3]),1,4) == string.sub(string.lower(gmcp.Char.Score.name),1,4) then
--Create Database if not exists, otherwise update table schema create_tfe_database()
--Load Database to local variable local mydb = db:get_database("skills")
local mysql = "select * from druidfadedspells where character = '" .. gmcp.Char.Score.name .. "' and alwaysonline = 'yes'" local results = db:fetch_sql(mydb.druidfadedspells, mysql) local spelllist = {}
if next(results) then for _, row in ipairs(results) do --Build a table of spells so as to consolidate all the records into row for output if row.leeched == "yes" then spellonline = "(active)" else spellonline = "(offline)" end table.insert(spelllist, row.spell..spellonline) end send("gstatus Here are the spells I leech: " .. table.concat(spelllist,", ") .. ".") else send("gstatus There are no spells in the database.") end end

Trigger.name: druid leech clear
Trigger.script:
if string.lower(matches[3]) == string.lower(gmcp.Char.Score.name) or string.sub(string.lower(matches[3]),1,3) == string.sub(string.lower(gmcp.Char.Score.name),1,3) or string.sub(string.lower(matches[3]),1,4) == string.sub(string.lower(gmcp.Char.Score.name),1,4) then
--Create Database if not exists, otherwise update table schema create_tfe_database()
--Load Database to local variable local mydb = db:get_database("skills") db:set(mydb.druidfadedspells.alwaysonline, "no", db:eq(mydb.druidfadedspells.character, gmcp.Char.Score.name)) send("gstatus druidleech spell list has been cleared.")
end

if string.lower(matches[3]) == string.lower(gmcp.Char.Score.name) or string.sub(string.lower(matches[3]),1,3) == string.sub(string.lower(gmcp.Char.Score.name),1,3) or string.sub(string.lower(matches[3]),1,4) == string.sub(string.lower(gmcp.Char.Score.name),1,4) then
Reset_Druid_Spells() end

" Make sure we are both in the same room.") send ("tell " .. matches[2] .. " Tell me 'embraceme' for cast embrace of earth on you.") send ("tell " .. matches[2] .. " Tell me 'thornme' for me to leech thorn shield.") send ("tell " .. matches[2] .. " Tell me 'shieldme' for me to cast living shield on you.") send ("tell " .. matches[2] .. " Give me a small wooden shield and ensure your shield spot is free before requesting living shield.") send ("tell " .. matches[2] .. " Tell me 'dowseme' for me to dowse for a drink.") send ("tell " .. matches[2] .. " Tell me 'feedme' for me to cast abundance for you - will not work in town.") send ("tell " .. matches[2] .. " Poke me for me to have an aqueous spirit heal you.") send ("tell " .. matches[2] .. " Tell me 'cpme' for cast cure poison on you.") send ("tell " .. matches[2] .. " Tell me 'cbme' for cast cure blindness on you.") send ("tell " .. matches[2] .. " Tell me 'observeme' for observe and report back to you.")

Trigger.name: Living ShieldMe

Trigger.name: ObserveMe
Trigger.script:
reportTo = "tell " .. tostring(matches[2])
if table.keys(gmcp.Char.Fighting)[1] then -- In Combat send("reply Sorry, I am in combat right now, please try again in a few.") elseif gmcp.Char.Status.position == "sleeping" then send("reply Sorry, I am in sleeping right now, please try again in a few.") elseif gmcp.Char.Status.position == "resting" then send("reply Sorry, I am in resting right now, please try again in a few.") else observeList = {} observerCaptureCounter = 0 enableTrigger("observeCapture") send("observe") end

Trigger.name: observeCapture
Trigger.script: if matches[1] == "============================================================" then if observerCaptureCounter > 0 then table.insert(observeList, matches[1]) disableTrigger("observeCapture") for k,v in pairs(observeList) do send (reportTo.." "..v) end else table.insert(observeList, matches[1]) --skip the first one, as that is the gate open observerCaptureCounter = observerCaptureCounter + 1 end else table.insert(observeList, matches[1]) end

Trigger.name: Thorn ShieldMe
Trigger.script:
--If you want to be using the matches table after calling expandAlias, --you should save it first as local oldmatches = matches before calling --expandAlias, since expandAlias will overwrite it after using it again. local oldmatches = matches[2]
send("stand") expandAlias("get3 thorn") send("cast thorn shield " .. oldmatches)
